Comment: Abilities: A0RL (Pocket Factory), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Creates a factory which automatically constructs Clockwerk Goblins.|n|nClockwerk Goblins have 1050 hit points, deal 37 - 39 damage, and explode upon death, causing up to 180 damage to nearby enemy units.|nFactory lasts 40 seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Clockwerk Goblins attack land units only.|r
